018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.lang.System.err;
022import static java.lang.System.out;
023import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
024import static java.nio.file.Files.copy;
025import static java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING;
026import static java.util.Locale.UK;
027import static java.util.Objects.isNull;
028import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
029import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_STRING;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_String_ARRAY;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNotEmptyArgument;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.splitString;
034
035import javax.lang.model.SourceVersion;
036import java.io.File;
037import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.net.MalformedURLException;
040import java.net.URL;
041import java.nio.file.Files;
042import java.time.Year;
043import java.util.ArrayList;
044import java.util.Collection;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Locale;
047import java.util.Map;
048import java.util.TreeMap;
049import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
050
051import org.apiguardian.api.API;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ProgramClass;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.ApplicationError;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.EmptyArgumentException;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.LambdaContainerException;
057
058/**
059 *  <p>{@summary Executes the {@code JavaDoc} tool with a bunch of default
060 *  parameters.}</p>
061 *  <p>The program takes the name of a file as the only command line argument;
062 *  that file contains the Javadoc options and parameters, as described in
063 *  { href https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/15/docs/specs/man/javadoc.html}
064 *  and
065 *  { href https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/15/docs/specs/javadoc/doc-comment-spec.html}.</p>
066 *  <p>The following default settings are made by the program:</p>
067 *  <pre><code>
068 *  -author
069 *  -bottom Copyright © 2002-2021 by Thomas Thrien (tquadrat.org)
070 *  -breakiterator
071 *  -charset UTF-8
072 *  -docencoding UTF-8
073 *  -docfilessubdirs
074 *  --enable-preview
075 *  -encoding UTF-8
076 *  --expand-requires all
077 *  -footer ""
078 *  -header ""
079 *  -html5
080 *  -javafx
081 *  -keywords
082 *  -link https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/15/docs/api/
083 *  -link https://apiguardian-team.github.io/apiguardian/docs/current/api/
084 *  -linksource
085 *  -locale en_GB
086 *  -notimestamp
087 *  -private
088 *  -quiet
089 *  -serialwarn
090 *  --show-members private
091 *  --show-module-contents all
092 *  --show-packages all
093 *  --show-types private
094 *  -source 15
095 *  -sourcetab 4
096 *  -splitindex
097 *  -tag note
098 *  -tag param
099 *  -tag return
100 *  -tag throws
101 *  -tag author
102 *  -tag extauthor
103 *  -tag thanks
104 *  -tag modified
105 *  -tag version
106 *  -tag since
107 *  -tag see
108 *  -tag inspired
109 *  -tag UMLGraph.link
110 *  -tag todo
111 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.AuthorTaglet
112 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.AnchorTaglet
113 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.HRefTaglet
114 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.IgnoreTaglet
115 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.IncludeTaglet
116 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.InspiredTaglet
117 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.ModifiedTaglet
118 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.NoteTaglet
119 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.ThanksTaglet
120 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.ToDoTaglet
121 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.UmlGraphLinkTaglet
122 *  -taglet org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.UnderlineTaglet
123 *  -top &lt;div style='overflow:auto;'&gt;&lt;img src='{&#64;docRoot}/resources/tquadrat_logo.jpg' alt='tquadrat.org' style='float:right;''&gt;&lt;p style='font-family:sans-serif;font-size:40px;font-weight:bold;padding-left:30px;'&gt;tquadrat Foundation Library%lt;/p'&gt;&lt;/div&gt;'
124 *  -use
125 *  -version
126 *  </code></pre>
127 *  <p>The format must have the following format:</p>
128 *  <ul>
129 *      <li>Lines beginning with the '#' symbol are comments and will be
130 *      ignored; same for empty lines.</li>
131 *      <li>A line with an option starts with a '-' hyphen; the arguments for
132 *      the option are separated with a blank from the option itself.</li>
133 *      <li>Usually, the end of the line terminates an option, but a backslash
134 *      as the last character of the line allows to extend the option into the
135 *      next line.</li>
136 *      <li>Each non-empty line that does not contain an option or a comment is
137 *      either a package or a source file.</li>
138 *  </ul>
139 *
140 *  @author  Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
141 *  @version $Id: JavadocStarter.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
142 *  @since 0.1.0
143 */
144@ProgramClass
145@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavadocStarter.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
146@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
147public final class JavadocStarter
148{
149        /*-----------*\
150    ====** Constants **========================================================
151        \*-----------*/
152    /**
153     *  The name of the logo file: {@value}.
154     */
155    public static final String LOGO = "tquadrat_logo.jpg";
156
157        /*------------*\
158    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
159        \*------------*/
160    /**
161     *  The tool provider.
162     */
163    private final ToolProvider m_ToolProvider;
164
165        /*------------------------*\
166    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
167        \*------------------------*/
168    /**
169     *  The default arguments.<br>
170     *  <br>The map is immutable.
171     */
172    private static final Map<String,String> m_DefaultArguments;
173
174    /**
175     *  The list of the Link URLs.
176     */
177    private static final Collection<URL> m_Links = new ArrayList<>();
178
179    /**
180     *  The arguments that can be replaced by those on the command line.<br>
181     *  <br>The key is the argument name, the value is the arguments value; it
182     *  will never be empty.<br>
183     *  <br>The map as such is immutable.
184     */
185    private static final Map<String,String> m_ReplaceableArguments;
186
187    /**
188     *  The tags and taglets.
189     */
190    private static final List<String> m_Tags;
191
192    static
193    {
194        Locale.setDefault( UK );
195
196        final Map<String,String> defaultArguments = new TreeMap<>();
197        defaultArguments.put( "-author", EMPTY_STRING );
198        defaultArguments.put( "-breakiterator", EMPTY_STRING );
199        defaultArguments.put( "-charset", UTF_8.name() );
200        defaultArguments.put( "-docencoding", UTF_8.name() );
201        defaultArguments.put( "-docfilessubdirs", EMPTY_STRING );
202        defaultArguments.put( "--enable-preview", EMPTY_STRING );
203        defaultArguments.put( "-encoding", UTF_8.name() );
204        defaultArguments.put( "-html5", EMPTY_STRING );
205        defaultArguments.put( "-javafx", EMPTY_STRING );
206        defaultArguments.put( "-keywords", EMPTY_STRING );
207        defaultArguments.put( "-linksource", EMPTY_STRING );
208        defaultArguments.put( "-locale", UK.toString() );
209        defaultArguments.put( "-notimestamp", EMPTY_STRING );
210        defaultArguments.put( "-quiet", EMPTY_STRING );
211        defaultArguments.put( "-serialwarn", EMPTY_STRING );
212        defaultArguments.put( "-source", Integer.toString( SourceVersion.latest().ordinal() ) );
213        defaultArguments.put( "-sourcetab", "4" );
214        defaultArguments.put( "-splitindex", EMPTY_STRING );
215        defaultArguments.put( "-use", EMPTY_STRING );
216        defaultArguments.put( "-version", EMPTY_STRING );
217        //defaultArguments.put( "-J--enable-preview", EMPTY_STRING );
218        m_DefaultArguments = Map.copyOf( defaultArguments );
219
220        final Map<String,String> replaceableArguments = new TreeMap<>();
221        replaceableArguments.put( "-bottom", format( "Copyright © 2002-%s by Thomas Thrien (tquadrat.org)", Year.now() ) );
222        replaceableArguments.put( "-d", "./doc" );
223        replaceableArguments.put( "--expand-requires", "all" );
224        replaceableArguments.put( "-footer", " " );
225        replaceableArguments.put( "-header", " " );
226        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-members", "private" );
227        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-module-contents", "all" );
228        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-packages", "all" );
229        replaceableArguments.put( "--show-types", "private" );
230        m_ReplaceableArguments = Map.copyOf( replaceableArguments );
231
232        m_Tags = List.of
233        (
234            //---* Register the Taglets *--------------------------------------
235            "-taglet " + AuthorTaglet.class.getName(),
236            "-taglet " + AnchorTaglet.class.getName(),
237            "-taglet " + HRefTaglet.class.getName(),
238            "-taglet " + IgnoreTaglet.class.getName(),
239            "-taglet " + IncludeTaglet.class.getName(),
240            "-taglet " + InspiredTaglet.class.getName(),
241            "-taglet " + ModifiedTaglet.class.getName(),
242            "-taglet " + NoteTaglet.class.getName(),
243            "-taglet " + ThanksTaglet.class.getName(),
244            "-taglet " + ToDoTaglet.class.getName(),
245            "-taglet " + UmlGraphLinkTaglet.class.getName(),
246            "-taglet " + UnderlineTaglet.class.getName(),
247
248            //---* Define the sequence *---------------------------------------
249            "-tag " + NoteTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
250            "-tag param",
251            "-tag return",
252            "-tag throws",
253            "-tag author",
254            "-tag " + AuthorTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
255            "-tag " + ThanksTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
256            "-tag " + ModifiedTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
257            "-tag version",
258            "-tag since",
259            "-tag see",
260            "-tag " + InspiredTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
261            "-tag " + UmlGraphLinkTaglet.TAGLET_NAME,
262            "-tag " + ToDoTaglet.TAGLET_NAME
263        );
264
265        //---* The links *-----------------------------------------------------
266        try
267        {
268            m_Links.add( new URL( "https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/15/docs/api/" ) );
269            m_Links.add( new URL( "https://apiguardian-team.github.io/apiguardian/docs/current/api/" ) );
270        }
271        catch( final MalformedURLException e )
272        {
273            //---* Should never happen *---------------------------------------
274            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
275        }
276    }
277
278        /*--------------*\
279    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
280        \*--------------*/
281    /**
282     *  Creates a new {@code JavadocStarter} instance.
283     *
284     *  @param  toolProvider    The tool provider for the Javadoc tool.
285     */
286    private JavadocStarter( final ToolProvider toolProvider )
287    {
288        m_ToolProvider = toolProvider;
289    }   //  JavadocStarter()
290
291        /*---------*\
292    ====** Methods **==========================================================
293        \*---------*/
294    /**
295     *  Does the program's work.
296     *
297     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
298     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when determine the project
299     *      location.
300     */
301    public final void execute( final String... args ) throws IOException
302    {
303        final var optionsFile = new File( requireNotEmptyArgument( args, "args" )[0] ).getAbsoluteFile();
304        if( !optionsFile.exists() ) throw new FileNotFoundException( optionsFile.getAbsolutePath() );
305
306        final List<String> localArgs = new ArrayList<>();
307        final var currentOptions = loadOptions( optionsFile );
308
309        out.println( "Options loaded" );
310
311        m_Tags.stream()
312            .map( t -> splitString( t, ' ' ) )
313            .map( List::of )
314            .forEach( localArgs::addAll );
315
316        m_Links.stream()
317            .map( link -> List.of( "-link", link.toExternalForm() ) )
318            .forEach( localArgs::addAll );
319
320        currentOptions.forEach( (k,v) ->
321        {
322            if( k.startsWith( "-" ) )
323            {
324                localArgs.add( k );
325            }
326            if( !v.isEmpty() )
327            {
328                if( v.isBlank() )
329                {
330                    localArgs.add( "\"\"" );
331                }
332                else
333                {
334                    localArgs.add( v );
335                }
336            }
337        } );
338
339        //---* Show the command line *-----------------------------------------
340        out.println( localArgs.stream().collect( joining( " ", "javadoc ", EMPTY_STRING ) ) );
341
342        //---* Execute the tool *----------------------------------------------
343        if( m_ToolProvider.run( out, err, localArgs.toArray( EMPTY_String_ARRAY ) ) == 0 )
344        {
345
346            //---* Write the logo file *---------------------------------------
347            final var targetFolder = new File( currentOptions.get( "-d" ), "resources" );
348            writeLogo( targetFolder );
349        }
350    }   //  execute()
351
352    /**
353     *  Joins lines in the options file that ends with a backslash with the
354     *  next line and return the new index.
355     *
356     *  @param  lines   The lines from the options file.
357     *  @param  index   The current index.
358     *  @param  currentLine The contents for the current line.
359     *  @return The new index.
360     */
361    private final int joinLines( final String[] lines, final int index, final StringBuilder currentLine )
362    {
363        var retValue = index;
364        var lastChar = currentLine.length() - 1;
365        while( (retValue < lines.length) && (currentLine.charAt( lastChar ) == '\\') )
366        {
367            currentLine.setLength( lastChar );
368            currentLine.append( lines [++retValue].trim() );
369            lastChar = currentLine.length() - 1;
370        }
371
372        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
373        return retValue;
374    }   //  joinLines()
375
376    /**
377     *  Reads the options file and returns the options from it.<br>
378     *  <br>The source files and package names will get the key
379     *  &quot;ARGUMENT&lt;<i>#</i>&gt;&quot; where <i>#</i> is a counter.
380     *
381     *  @param  optionsFile The options file.
382     *  @return The options from the file, or from
383     *      {@link #m_ReplaceableArguments}.
384     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the options file.
385     */
386    private final Map<String,String> loadOptions( final File optionsFile ) throws IOException
387    {
388        final var lines = Files.readAllLines( optionsFile.toPath(), UTF_8 ).toArray( String[]::new );
389        var counter = 0;
390        var index = 0;
391        final Map<String,String> retValue = new TreeMap<>( m_DefaultArguments );
392        retValue.putAll( m_ReplaceableArguments );
393        retValue.put( "-d", optionsFile.getParent() );
394
395        ReadLoop: while( index < lines.length )
396        {
397            final var currentLine = new StringBuilder( lines [index].trim() );
398            if( currentLine.isEmpty() || (currentLine.charAt( 0 ) == '#') )
399            {
400                //---* Comment *-----------------------------------------------
401                ++index;
402                continue ReadLoop;
403            }
404
405            if( currentLine.charAt( 0 ) == '-' )
406            {
407                index = joinLines( lines, index, currentLine );
408
409                //---* An option *---------------------------------------------
410                final var pos = currentLine.indexOf( " " );
411                if( pos < 0 )
412                {
413                    //---* Option without argument *---------------------------
414                    retValue.put( currentLine.toString(), EMPTY_STRING );
415                }
416                else
417                {
418                    //---* Option with an argument *---------------------------
419                    final var key = currentLine.substring( 0, pos );
420                    final var value = currentLine.substring( pos ).trim();
421                    retValue.put( key, value );
422                }
423                ++index;
424                continue ReadLoop;
425            }
426
427            index = joinLines( lines, index, currentLine ) + 1;
428            retValue.put( format( "ARGUMENT<%d>", ++counter ), currentLine.toString() );
429        }   //  ReadLoop:
430
431        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
432        return retValue;
433    }   //  loadOptions()
434
435    /**
436     *  The program entry point.
437     *
438     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
439     */
440    public static void main( final String... args )
441    {
442        try
443        {
444            ToolProvider.findFirst( "javadoc" )
445                .ifPresentOrElse( toolProvider ->
446                {
447                    final var application = new JavadocStarter( toolProvider );
448                    try
449                    {
450                        application.execute( args );
451                    }
452                    catch( final EmptyArgumentException | IOException e )
453                    {
454                        throw new LambdaContainerException( e );
455                    }
456                },
457                () -> { throw new ApplicationError( "Cannot find Tool 'javadoc'" ); } );
458        }
459        catch( final LambdaContainerException e )
460        {
461            if( e.checkIfExpected( EmptyArgumentException.class ) )
462            {
463                err.println( "No options file provided" );
464            }
465            else if( e.checkIfExpected( FileNotFoundException.class ) )
466            {
467                err.printf( "Options file '%s' not found%n", e.getCause().getMessage() );
468            }
469            else
470            {
471                e.getCause().printStackTrace( err );
472            }
473        }
474        catch( final Throwable t )
475        {
476            //---* Handle any previously unhandled exceptions *----------------
477            t.printStackTrace( err );
478        }
479    }   //  main()
480
481    /**
482     *  Writes the logo to the given folder.
483     *
484     *  @param  targetFolder    The destination folder.
485     *  @throws IOException Cannot write the logo file.
486     */
487    private final void writeLogo( final File targetFolder ) throws IOException
488    {
489        final var logoResource = getClass().getResource( "resources/" + LOGO );
490        if( isNull( logoResource ) ) throw new ApplicationError( format( "Resource '%s' is missing", LOGO ) );
491        final var outputFile = new File( targetFolder, LOGO ).getAbsoluteFile().toPath();
492        try( final var inputStream = logoResource.openStream() )
493        {
494            copy( inputStream, outputFile, REPLACE_EXISTING );
495        }
496    }   //  writeLogo()
497}
498//  class JavadocStarter
499
500/*
501 *  End of File
502 */
